name: Light's Remit
title: Layla: Light's Remit
in_play_description: When Layla is on the field and has this card equipped, every time Shooting Star deals DMG, draw 1 card.

attributes.source: Reward for inviting Layla to a duel at The Cat's Tail and achieving all corresponding challenge objectives

skills.desc:
Combat Action: When your active character is Layla, equip this card.
After Layla equips this card, immediately use Nights of Formal Focus.
When Layla is on the field and has this card equipped, every time Shooting Star deals DMG, draw 1 card.
(You must have Layla in your deck to add this card to your deck.)
